description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Drag Impact is an exciting and intense, speed-action game that will keep you at the edge of your seat. The game features drag races with insane chases, car crashes and explosions. It includes multiple style themes and levels with action-packed boss battles.   Drive your engines fast with power nitro boosts and explode the enemies with explosive traps CRASH! BANG! BOOM! Are you ready to race?
